thread.section_title: Chelsea Savoy Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Value
thread.title_full: Great Value - Review of Chelsea Savoy Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BostonScooter
title: Great Value
text:
Recenitly stayed here for 3 nights on a guys trip for Big East and ACC Basketball Tournaments. Rooms were suprising big, we had 4 adults in 1 room and did not have a problem but we are not high maintenance. Great location within walking distance to Madison Square Garden.
The room was basic but was cleaned daily and provided extra towels and suited our needs just fine. We found the hotel tobe very quiet and a great overall value.
